title: Citi Guatemala Holds Solutions Fair for Credit Card Clients
summary: Guatemala City, Guatemala - As part of Citi's global commitment to promoting responsible finance, Citi Guatemala will hold its second "Solutions Fair" of 2013 to offer credit card clients who are behind on their payments with solutions for reducing debt.
tag-1: Citi Guatemala Holds Solutions Fair for Credit Card Clients
tag-3: Guatemala City, Guatemala – As part of Citi's global commitment to promoting responsible finance, Citi Guatemala will hold its second "Solutions Fair" of 2013 to offer credit card clients who are behind on their payments with solutions for reducing debt.
tag-4: The event will be held December 12-14 on the fifth floor of the Céntrica Plaza building. It will provide clients who are more than 60 days behind on their credit card payments with opportunities to reduce their debt or collection fees via:
tag-5: "We decided to hold this fair in December because we want our clients to enjoy the holiday season with peace of mind. What better way than taking advantage of their Christmas bonuses to pay off their debts?" remarked Luis Fernando Gómez, Segments and Products Manager at Citi Guatemala. "At Citi, we are committed to our clients. We know that getting out of debt is possible and requires time, discipline and a positive attitude."
tag-6: Clients who are not able to attend the Solutions Fair can receive personalized service by calling 24229314 or 24229999, ext. 3468.
tag-7: "Financial responsibility is part of Citi's global commitment," noted Bernardo Chacín, Citi Guatemala's General Manager. "We want to help our clients by offering transparent, simple and innovative products and services as well as comprehensive solutions for paying their debts."
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
